sentences: Carol Claire Aguilar Banawa-Crisostomo (born March 4, 1981), better known in the Philippines as Carol Banawa, is a US-based Filipina singer, actress, and nurse.
Raised in Batangas, she has two siblings, Alexander and Cherry.
Banawa started singing when she was a little girl while her family lived in Saudi Arabia.
Her family then moved back to the Philippines.
She has performed at the Madison Square Garden in New York City at the 2003 New York Music Festival.
